body:
https://soundcloud.com/arndndarnd/broken/s-G2yFJ

I'm actually really enjoying this as of right now. I worked like 45 minutes on the sidechaining and the vocal chops and all of that. Please, if any of you know about mixing or is up to give me feedback, please feel free. That's why I made this.

title: Remixing this song for a contest. (Feedback)

replies.body: I really like it but I think you should drag out the ending a little bit instead of the abrupt ending in the current one.
